pullrequest.title: Fix InertiaVisual for non-diagonal inertia matrices

content.raw:
Note that a unit test for `InertiaVisual` is being added in pull request #2331.

Another idea for a test would be to load the test world and check the InertiaVisual's bounding box (`Visual::GetBoundingBox`), and/or the geometry size (`Visual::GetGeometrySize`).
content.html:
Note that a unit test for InertiaVisual is being added in pull request #2331.

Another idea for a test would be to load the test world and check the InertiaVisual's bounding box (Visual::GetBoundingBox), and/or the geometry size (Visual::GetGeometrySize).
